content: these dishcloths are created using the waffle stitch which is one of my favourite stitches to use when i want a rough texture which is definitely something you want when trying to scrub your lovely munchkin s 7 day old plate that had been hiding under their bed in their room you can alter the size of this pattern by simply adding more chains at the beginning and more row as you work through the pattern until you have reached the size you like instructions have been included in the pattern as well as instructions for an optional border
